Is anyone else getting the error "unregistered torrent pass"?
You have to d/l it from torrentportal.

Superb - I have the 15 CDs but gave up trying to rip them to mp3 after several attempts due to the perverse track division (each CD is split into 12-15 tracks with little apparent logic) and the audible 'clicks' you get between each track. 

This download solves both these problems and I can well appreciate how much work that must have required. 

Thanks!
